revised_title: Molecular Manufacturing: Exploring the Ultimate Limits of Fabrication
tldr: This article discusses the concept of molecular manufacturing and its potential to revolutionize fabrication processes. By using direct positional control, molecular manufacturing can overcome limitations of current fabrication technologies, enabling the creation of nanoscale structures with atomic precision and high productivity. The author explores the implications of physical principles on the ultimate limits of fabrication and the role of physical law in determining technological possibilities.
